t: Amazon.com : Horizon Hound Down Camping Blanket - Outdoor Travel Quilt | Sustainable, Insulated, Lightweight & Warm Gear for Sleep, Camping, Stadium, Hiking & Festivals | Water Resistant, Packable & Compact : Sports & Outdoors
s: I did comparisons with all the other major brands (including Rumpl, yes), and this one came up the clear winner. I wanted down fill for the warmth, as I live in a cold climate and I wanted something that could help extend my outdoor time during the winter months. Winner? Horizon Hound.
